def_cn: (狮子、狐狸等野生动物的)兽穴，兽窝
def_en: A den is the home of certain types of wild animals such as lions or foxes.

def_cn: (家里用来学习、工作或从事业余爱好的)书房，私室
def_en: Your den is a quiet room in your house where you can go to study, work, or carry on a hobby without being disturbed.

def_cn: (通常指为了从事非法活动的)秘密聚集处，窝点，巢穴
def_en: A den is a secret place where people meet, usually for a dishonest purpose.

def_cn: (某一不良行为或非法活动的猖獗)场所，渊薮
def_en: If you describe a place as a den of a particular type of bad or illegal behaviour, you mean that a lot of that type of behaviour goes on there.
